about_the_game:
🤠 Build Your Homestead and Prepare for Battle 🤠
Establish your sanctuary amidst the chaos of the frontier. Gather resources, construct sturdy shelters, and fortify your homestead against bandits and wild beasts. Your ranch is more than a sanctuary; it's a beacon of civilization where you can cultivate crops, rear livestock, and prepare for the inevitable confrontations ahead.

🐺 Hunt, Tame, and Breed Wild Animals 🐺
Venture into the wilderness to hunt for valuable resources and tame wild animals to aid you in your adventures. But why stop there? Lure animals to become your loyal pets and breed them at your ranch to create a lineage with the best perks. Raise a fierce wolf or a mighty bear to fight on your side!

🐴 Saddle Up and Ride Across the Frontier! 🐴
No cowboy is complete without their trusty steed. Build a stable to house a variety of horse breeds and colors, each suited for different tasks. Whether you need speed for swift journeys or strength for hauling wagons, breed and raise your unique line of horses, ensuring your legacy rides on through the generations.

🧨 Craft Weapons and Gear - Your Arsenal Awaits! 🧨
Master the art of crafting to defend yourself against the dangers of the West. From pistols to rifles, knives to bows, and everything in between, choose the perfect tool for every situation. Collect blueprints of various rarities, allowing you to enhance your gear and increase its effectiveness. Whether you prefer sharpshooting or close-quarters combat, tailor your arsenal to fit your style!

🏆 Compete in PvP Showdowns and Form Alliances 🏆
Test your skills against fellow cowboys in thrilling PvP battles. Join or create alliances to strategize and dominate the competition for Gold Rush. Climb the ranks, complete bounties, and claim your place among the legends of the West.

💰 Embark on Epic Quests and Events 💰
Explore the global map for quests, time-limited events, bandit camps, and other points of interest. Keep an eye out for special in-game events and battle passes held regularly to keep the frontier experience fresh and exciting. The Wild West holds a lot of opportunities for adventurers!

Unleash your inner cowboy in Westland Survival! Ride in for the ultimate frontier experience and carve your name into the annals of Wild West legend. The untamed West awaits—will you answer its call?"

🤠 Build Your Homestead and Prepare for Battle 🤠
Establish your sanctuary amidst the chaos of the frontier. Gather resources, construct sturdy shelters, and fortify your homestead against bandits and wild beasts. Your ranch is more than a sanctuary; it's a beacon of civilization where you can cultivate crops, rear livestock, and prepare for the inevitable confrontations ahead.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or better with SSE2 support or equivalent AMD family
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Westland Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 10 support or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Saddle up for the ultimate survival adventure in the untamed Wild West! Build your homestead, tame the wilderness, bounty hunt the outlaws, and duel against the dangers that lurk on the frontier. Do you have what it takes to be a legend of the West?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese, Hindi, Persian
